channel.title: Help please!
channel.description: How can I get the Zdiddyreloaded source to connect from my client or silabs..instead of the ZDR client? Please Help.

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Patrickftw:

Hm…did you try changing the Ip it connects to?

You have it backwards. Only the client will connect to the server not another client.

This is my last help topic for the day. Time to code pl0x. =]

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

K i got it. Hang on.

[code] public void run() {
isActive = false;
long serverSessionKey = 0, clientSessionKey = 0;

    serverSessionKey = ((long) (java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D) << 32)
            + (long) (java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D);

    try {
          
        fillInStream(2); // Anti-nuller by Slysoft
        int namePart = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            out.write(i);
        }
        out.write(0);
		
        outStream.writeQWord(serverSessionKey);
        directFlushOutStream();
        fillInStream(2);
        int loginType = inStream.readUnsignedByte()

        int loginPacketSize = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
        int loginEncryptPacketSize = loginPacketSize - (36 + 1 + 1 + 2); // the size of the RSA encrypted part (containing password)

        if (loginEncryptPacketSize <= 0) {
            shutdownError("Zero RSA packet size!");
            return;
        }
        fillInStream(loginPacketSize);
        if (inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 255
                || inStream.readUnsignedWord() != 317) {
            shutdownError("Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317)");
            return;
        }
        lowMemoryVersion = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
        for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
            String junk = Integer.toHexString(inStream.readDWord());
        }
        loginEncryptPacketSize--;
        int tmp = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

        if (loginEncryptPacketSize != tmp) {
            shutdownError(
                    "Encrypted packet data length ("
                            + loginEncryptPacketSize
                            + ") different from length byte thereof (" + tmp
                            + ")");
            return;
        }
        tmp = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
        if (tmp != 10) {
            shutdownError(
                    "Encrypted packet Id was " + tmp + " but expected 10");
            return;
        }
        clientSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
        serverSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
        int junk = inStream.readDWord();

        playerName = inStream.readString();
        playerName.toLowerCase();
        if (playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0) {
            disconnected = true;
        }
        playerPass = inStream.readString();
        try {
            playerServer = inStream.readString();
        } catch (Exception e) {
            playerServer = "zdiddyreloaded";
        }

        int sessionKey[] = new int[4];

        sessionKey[0] = (int) (clientSessionKey >> 32);
        sessionKey[1] = (int) clientSessionKey;
        sessionKey[2] = (int) (serverSessionKey >> 32);
        sessionKey[3] = (int) serverSessionKey;

        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {}
        inStreamDecryption = new Cryption(sessionKey);
        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
            sessionKey[i] += 50;
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {}
        outStreamDecryption = new Cryption(sessionKey);
        outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption;
        if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains("holy")
                && !playerName.toLowerCase().equalsIgnoreCase("holy")) {
            this.destruct();
        }
        if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains("luke")
                && !playerName.toLowerCase().equalsIgnoreCase("luke")) {
            this.destruct();
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("syipk")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[staff]")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("#")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("}")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("{")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("^")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("@")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("$")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[Staff]")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[Moderator]")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("~")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("BTS_")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("fucks")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("mrquarter")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("JAGEX")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            returnCode = 4;
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("SYI")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
            returnCode = 4;
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("Hellz")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            returnCode = 4;
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if (playerName.startsWith("JAGEX")) {
            returnCode = 4;
            playerName = "_";
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if (playerName.startsWith("PHAT")) {
            returnCode = 4;
            playerName = "_";
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("runescape")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            returnCode = 4;
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("silab")) {
            disconnected = true;
            this.destruct();
            appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
        }
        returnCode = 2;

        checkbannedusers();
        checkbannedips();

        if (checkbannedusers() == 5) {
            returnCode = 4;
            System.out.println(
                    playerName + " failed to logon because they are banned.");
            appendToLR(
                    playerName + " failed to logon because they are banned.");
            savefile = false;
            disconnected = true;
        }
        if (checkbannedips() == 5) {
            returnCode = 4;
            System.out.println(
                    playerName
                            + " failed to logon because their ip is banned.");
            appendToLR(
                    playerName
                            + " failed to logon because their ip is banned.");
            savefile = false;
            this.destruct();
            disconnected = true;
        }  
        if (junk != 5456934) {
            out.write(15);
            this.destruct();
        }
        if (playerName.startsWith("JAGEX")) {
            returnCode = 4;
            playerName = "_";
            disconnected = true;
            teleportToX = 0;
            teleportToY = 0;
        }
        if (playerName.startsWith("SYI")
                || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("syip")) {
            returnCode = 4;
            playerName = "_";
            disconnected = true;
            teleportToX = 0;
            teleportToY = 0;
        }
        int LoadGame = loadGame(playerName, playerPass);

        if (PlayerHandler.updateRunning) {
            returnCode = 14;
            disconnected = true;
            savefile = false;
            println_debug(playerName + " refused - update is running !");
        }
                   
        if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(playerName)) {
            returnCode = 5;
            playerName = "_";
            disconnected = true;
            teleportToX = 0;
            teleportToY = 0;
        } else {
            // int LoadGame = loadGame(playerName, playerPass);

            checkbannedusers();
            checkbannedips();
            if (readSave() != 3 && checkbannedusers() != 5
                    && checkbannedips() != 5) {
                loadmoreinfo();
                NewHP = playerLevel[3];
                loggedinpm();
            }

            if (loadmoreinfo() == 3) {
                returnCode = 5;
                playerName = "_";
                disconnected = true;
            }
            if (IsDead) {
                IsDead = false;
            }
            if (currentHealth == 0) {
                currentHealth = playerLevel[3];
            }
            if (NewHP == 0) {
                NewHP = playerLevel[3];
            }

            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(3); // 0 for walk?, 1 for trade, 2 for duel, 3 for attacking, 4 for trade, 5 for right-click kicking, 6+ nothing
            outStream.writeByteA(1);
            outStream.writeString("Attack");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();

            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(1); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
            outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
            outStream.writeString("Trade with");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();

            if (playerId == -1) {
                out.write(7); // "This world is full."
            } else if (playerServer.equals("INVALID")) {
                out.write(10);
            } else {
                out.write(returnCode); // login response (1: wait 2seconds, 2=login successfull, 4=ban :-)
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                out.write(2); // Crown fixup
            } else {
                out.write(playerRights); // mod level
            }
            out.write(0); // no log

        } 
    } catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) {
        // destruct();
        return;
    }
    // }
    isActive = true;
    if (playerId == -1 || returnCode != 2) {
        return;
    }		// nothing more to do
    // End of login procedure
    packetSize = 0;
    packetType = -1;

    readPtr = 0;
    writePtr = 0;

    int numBytesInBuffer, offset;

    while (!disconnected) {

        synchronized (this) {
            if (writePtr == readPtr) {
                try {
                    wait();
                } catch (java.lang.InterruptedException _ex) {}
            }

            if (disconnected) {
                return;
            }

            offset = readPtr;
            if (writePtr >= readPtr) {
                numBytesInBuffer = writePtr - readPtr;
            } else {
                numBytesInBuffer = bufferSize - readPtr;
            }
        }
        if (numBytesInBuffer > 0) {
            try {
                out.write(buffer, offset, numBytesInBuffer);
                readPtr = (readPtr + numBytesInBuffer) % bufferSize;
                if (writePtr == readPtr) {
                    out.flush();
                }
            } catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) {
                disconnected = true;
            }
        }
    }

}[/code]

Tell me if you get any errors, I think i forgot to delete something.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Peter234 Peter234
item.description:
@Peter234 wrote:

Way too long…I think it might have to do with the “zdiddyreloaded” But I’m not sure what…I can’t think 

    public void run() {
        isActive = false;
        long serverSessionKey = 0, clientSessionKey = 0;

        serverSessionKey = ((long) (java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D) << 32)
                + (long) (java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D);

        try {
              
            fillInStream(2); // Anti-nuller by Slysoft
            int namePart = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

            for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {

            }
            out.write(0);
			
            outStream.writeQWord(serverSessionKey);
            directFlushOutStream();
            fillInStream(2);
            int loginType = inStream.readUnsignedByte();	

            if (loginType != 16 && loginType != 18) {
                return;
            }
            int loginPacketSize = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
            int loginEncryptPacketSize = loginPacketSize - (36 + 1 + 1 + 2); // the size of the RSA encrypted part (containing password)

            if (loginEncryptPacketSize <= 0) {
                shutdownError("Zero RSA packet size!");
                return;
            }
            fillInStream(loginPacketSize);
            if (inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 255
                    || inStream.readUnsignedWord() != 317) {
                shutdownError("Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317)");
                return;
            }
            lowMemoryVersion = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
            for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
                String junk = Integer.toHexString(inStream.readDWord());
            }
            loginEncryptPacketSize--;
            int tmp = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

            if (loginEncryptPacketSize != tmp) {
                shutdownError(
                        "Encrypted packet data length ("
                                + loginEncryptPacketSize
                                + ") different from length byte thereof (" + tmp
                                + ")");
                return;
            }
            tmp = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
            if (tmp != 10) {

                        "Encrypted packet Id was " + tmp + " but expected 10");
                return;
            }
            clientSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
            serverSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();
            int junk = inStream.readDWord();

            playerName = inStream.readString();
            playerName.toLowerCase();
            if (playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0) {
                disconnected = true;
            }
            playerPass = inStream.readString();
            try {
                playerServer = inStream.readString();
            } catch (Exception e) {
                playerServer = "zdiddyreloaded";
            }

            int sessionKey[] = new int[4];

            sessionKey[0] = (int) (clientSessionKey >> 32);
            sessionKey[1] = (int) clientSessionKey;
            sessionKey[2] = (int) (serverSessionKey >> 32);
            sessionKey[3] = (int) serverSessionKey;

            for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {}
            inStreamDecryption = new Cryption(sessionKey);
            for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
                sessionKey[i] += 50;
            }

            for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {}
            outStreamDecryption = new Cryption(sessionKey);
            outStream.packetEncryption = outStreamDecryption;
            if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains("holy")
                    && !playerName.toLowerCase().equalsIgnoreCase("holy")) {
                this.destruct();
            }
            if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains("luke")
                    && !playerName.toLowerCase().equalsIgnoreCase("luke")) {
                this.destruct();
            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("syipk")) {
                disconnected = true;

                appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[staff]")) {
                disconnected = true;
                this.destruct();
                appendToIPBanned(playerLastConnect);
            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("#")) {

            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("}")) {

            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("{")) {

            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("^")) {

            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("[")) {

            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("~")) {

            }
            if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains("JAGEX")) {

            returnCode = 2;

            checkbannedusers();

            if (checkbannedusers() == 5) {
                returnCode = 4;
                System.out.println(
                        playerName + " failed to logon because they are banned.");
                appendToLR(
                        playerName + " failed to logon because they are banned.");

                System.out.println(

                                + " failed to logon because their ip is banned.");
                appendToLR(

                                + " failed to logon because their ip is banned.");

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Peter234 Peter234
item.description:
@Peter234 wrote:

…Replace EVERYTHING WITH THAT? If so, I did and got 100 errors.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2008, 05:03:07 PM[/size][hr]…Nevermind…But it’s already in there…

    public void run() {
        isActive = false;
        long serverSessionKey = 0, clientSessionKey = 0;

        serverSessionKey = ((long) (java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D) << 32)
                + (long) (java.lang.Math.random() * 99999999D);

        try {
              
            fillInStream(2); // Anti-nuller by Slysoft
            int namePart = inStream.readUnsignedByte();

            for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
                out.write(i);
            }
            out.write(0);
			
            outStream.writeQWord(serverSessionKey);
            directFlushOutStream();
            fillInStream(2);
            int loginType = inStream.readUnsignedByte();	

            if (loginType != 16 && loginType != 18) {
                return;
            }
            int loginPacketSize = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
            int loginEncryptPacketSize = loginPacketSize - (36 + 1 + 1 + 2); // the size of the RSA encrypted part (containing password)

            if (loginEncryptPacketSize <= 0) {
                shutdownError("Zero RSA packet size!");
                return;
            }
Here->>            fillInStream(loginPacketSize); <--Here
            if (inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 255
                    || inStream.readUnsignedWord() != 317) {
                shutdownError("Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317)");
                return;
            }
            lowMemoryVersion = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
            for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {
                String junk = Integer.toHexString(inStream.readDWord());
            }
